metadata.name: Bronzed Sun of Pompei
metadata.description:
One of my personal photographs showcasing a beautiful dramatic vista and skyline at the ruins of Pompei, Italy.

The scene is located at the exit of the ruins and features a bronze statue overlooking the rolling hills in the distance. This scene gave me the feeling that the statue is bowing it's head and mourning the fall of a once great city during a time of prosperity and power.

To create this piece, I edited the original photograph, enhanced it with filters, and animated certain parts to create a seamless stunning visual looping NFT.

Art specifications:
Mp4 file
2.1K pixel dimensions
4k export
12-second seamless loop

Enjoy - Pd :-)
